attributes.action: Shake up the law on compensation claims..
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I find it incomprehensible, that someone with a 'repetative strain' injury, or even a criminal, claiming liable, can get more compensation, than
iether a soldier seriously injured on active service, MEDALS DONT PAY THE BILLS! or a victim of serious crime, resulting in ireversable injury, and the fact criminals serving time can claim is 'beyond a joke' when were paying to keep em in jail as it is! Anything they would get should go towards the compensation of thier victims, not feather thie bank accounts for when they are paroled.
